Wyn Drabble: Have you been anthropomorphising with your plants lately? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-have-you-been-anthropomorphising-with-your-plants-lately/JCB7G3TCSRH37NCM3PTDP43HTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-have-you-been-anthropomorphising-with-your-plants-lately/JCB7G3TCSRH37NCM3PTDP43HTE/ Wyn DrabbleOPINION: Popular comments included, “You’re getting big". Wed, 27 Dec 2023 21:52:38 +0000 Wyn Drabble found a London study which found that 44% of adults frequently talked with their houseplants and 40% of that group asked their plants if they were thirsty.
